name: Bomb Squirrel (shmador)
description:
ATTENTION!

Havoc fell on your tree house when the birdies became hostile. Luckily, your belly is equipped with 5 tons worth of explosives. Time to settle the peace!

(Made for ld 51)

Controls

Arrows - Move

Space - Jump

Z - Reverse Arrows

Credits

Art, Programming, Level Design - Shmador

Sound - Daniel Haddad
